summary: Integration test suite for the Flax implementation of the Wav2Vec2 speech recognition model, verifying end‑to‑end inference, CTC robustness in batched mode, pretrained weight loading, and language‑model assisted decoding with various pooling configurations.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the Flax Wav2Vec2 model in production pipelines by automatically detecting regressions in inference accuracy, robustness, and language‑model integration.
